definition: to question/to ask/to raise a question
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Here he would jump on unsuspecting passersby, as Xenophon records.
sentences.chinese: 据色诺顿的记载，他会向毫无准备的路人发问。
请发问，很难让我指出让谁提问，请这位女同学。

sentences.english: As soon as the President finished his talk, the reporters began firing away with questions.
sentences.chinese: 总统一讲完话，新闻记者便开始了一连串的发问。

sentences.english: " asked Chile's Mercurio newspaper after Brazil had eliminated the hosts in the semi-final.
sentences.chinese: 智利《水星》报在巴西队半决赛淘汰东道主后发问。

sentences.english: The journalists fired away at the spokesman as soon as he stopped talking.
sentences.chinese: 发言人一讲完话，记者就像连珠炮似地对他发问。

sentences.english: Bush is holding out for the cumbersome format of a panel of journalist questioners that has clotted past debates.
sentences.chinese: 但是布什先生坚持由一组记者来发问的笨拙形式。

sentences.english: Rinzai climbed down from the pulpit and passed through the crowd of monks to reach the questioner.
sentences.chinese: 临济从讲坛上爬下来，穿过人群来到发问者面前。

sentences.english: Eyebrows go up, the person knows the answer to the question they're asking.
sentences.chinese: 眼眉向上抬，表示发问的人知道问题的答案。

sentences.english: It is evident that the questioners wished to test him rather than to know about the truth.
sentences.chinese: 很明显的，发问者意图试验他，远甚于要知道真理。

sentences.english: Ruthie asks at the end of what she estimates is five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 约摸着过了五分钟，露丝发问了。
右脑学习法需要常常发问。

sentences.english: And one of them, a doctor of the law, asking him, tempting him.
sentences.chinese: 他们中有一个法学士试探他，发问说。

sentences.english: Feel free to ask questions or prompt discussion among faculty and students as part of your presentation.
sentences.chinese: 陈述时，请随意向同学和老师发问或带起讨论。

sentences.english: He questioned himself; he felt himself; all these vanished realities made him dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 他暗自发问，他在思索，消逝了的往事使他头晕目眩。

sentences.english: Archives of the past winners and questioners.
sentences.chinese: 档案馆过去的获奖者和发问。

definition: to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to interrupt (sb talking)/to butt in/to cut into a conversation
